headline: Ask HN: Does HN block iCloud private relay requests?
description:
I can't seem to load HN when using Safari's iCloud private relay. The HTTP status code is 403

https://i.imgur.com/RfufQep.png

Or, perhaps, someone is abusing icloud private relay and HN has blocked that IP/CIDR and I am on that IP/CIDR

When I use Firefox/curl etc, I see HTTP 200 Ok response so I am quite certain it has something to do with IP
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: HN是否阻止iCloud私人中继请求？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: HN是否阻止iCloud私人中繼請求？
description_zh-Hans:
在使用Safari的iCloud私人中继时，我似乎无法加载HN。HTTP状态代码是403

https://i.imgur.com/RfufQep.png

或者，也许有人在滥用icloud私人中继，而HN已经阻止了那个IP/CIDR，而我就在那个IP/CIDR上

当我使用Firefox/curl等时，我看到HTTP 200 Ok响应，所以我很确定这与IP有关。
description_zh-Hant:
在使用Safari的iCloud私人中繼時，我似乎無法加載HN。HTTP狀態代碼是403

https://i.imgur.com/RfufQep.png

或者，也許有人在濫用icloud私人中繼，而HN已經阻止了那個IP/CIDR，而我就在那個IP/CIDR上

當我使用Firefox/curl等時，我看到HTTP 200 Ok響應，所以我很確定這與IP有關。
